news.title: GeNToo - Gentoo on the Microsoft NT kernel

body.p: We are happy to announce the first experimental release of Gentoo for the NT kernel! Away from mainstream Gentoo a group of developers has managed to push the flexibility of our distribution to new heights and getting it to run natively on the well-known NT kernel!
Further information, a howto, some screenshots and installscripts can be found at the project's website.
body.note: GeNToo is not officially supported yet, please address enquiries directly to the developers listed on its project pages.
